§5The Eternal Guardian's Band§r is an ancient ring found in the depths of the Ancient City. When first discovered, it is broken and dormant.

To attune to the ring, you must §csuck the souls§r of hostile creatures.

§6Death Protection§r

Once attuned, when you die with the ring equipped, a §5Tombstone§r will be created containing all your items and experience.

An §cEternal Guardian§r will spawn to protect your belongings from other players.
